EmailTemplate.name: POD Customer Credit
EmailTemplate.subject: Kenmore Direct POD Request Notification/ Sales order #{!Case.Sales_Order__c}, Inv # {!Case.Invoice__c} and Customer PO {!Case.cust_po__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Kenmore Direct has completed the request for proof of delivery/ bill of lading of invoice {!Case.Invoice__c} associated to sales order#{!Case.Sales_Order__c} /purchase order# {!Case.cust_po__c} Due to there being no signature present or not legible, Kenmore Direct will be issuing a credit in the amount of the dispute/billing in question.
Please allow 7-10 business days to process this credit and allow it to post to the original method of payment; check refunds may take up to 20 days to receive. For status of credit/check refund, please email: kdcreditmgmt@kenmorediect.com for additional assistance.
Thank you for your business -
Kenmore Direct Post Delivery team
